Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class MainEsiInterface

Main interface for communicating with the ESI API. Holds references to specialized interfaces, has some helper functions and takes care of authentication of the user.

Constructors

| Improve this Doc View Source

MainEsiInterface(TextWriter)

Basic contstructor, creates the instances of other interfaces and the Printer, and also creates the EsiClient used for communication with ESI. If there is an auth token from a previous session, uses it again.

Declaration
public MainEsiInterface(TextWriter writer)

HandleAuthorize(String[])

Handles the authorization of a user. Takes care of the OAuth authorization process, and refers the end-user to the auth page.
